actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the credit allowable for certain household and dependent care expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income tax credit for expenses for household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment from 20 percent to 50 percent of the allowable expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the credit allowable for certain household and dependent care expenses.
